description.html:
• Portable – Locking casters allow easy navigation anywhere on smooth surfaces like wood, linoleum and tile
  • Durable Design – Ultra-sturdy molded construction for sustained use
  • Sleek Look – Blends into any environment like banquet rooms, lobbies and poolside areas
  • Removable Cutting Board – Serves as a prep area and is detachable for easy cleaning
  • 15 Gallon Ice Bin & Lid – Keeps ice contained and is easy to clean featuring an integrated drain
  • Stainless Steel Speed Rak® – Holds six bottles or six Stor N’ Pour® containers
  • Storage Drawers – Hold small bottles and cans, tools, cups and other drink accessories
  • Multi-Sized Storage Areas – Accommodate washracks, liquor bottles, prepped ingredients and accessories
